pullrequest.title: Check callback is valid before calling it

content.raw:
Looks like a build failure on windows and a test failure on OSX.

I think windows CI can be ignored since it failed to compile ignition msgs 

    C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio 12.0\VC\INCLUDE\xstring(1055) : fatal error C1001: An internal error has occurred in the compiler.
    (compiler file 'msc1.cpp', line 1325)

‌

OSX failures seem all over the place. I intend to run  CI on ign-transport2 branch to check if any failing tests are pre-existing, though running into some build farm issues at the moment.
